name: OR_CASE_ANES_CONT
description: The OR_CASE_ANES_CONT table contains OR management system case anesthesia contingencies.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the anesthesia contingencies for this case.

columns.name: ANES_PREOP_CONT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates a pre-operative anesthesia contingency.
